scripts.build: cp node_modules/angular/angular.min.* lib/angular && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.* lib/jquery && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/* lib/bootstrap/css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/fonts/* lib/bootstrap/fonts && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/* lib/bootstrap/js && cp node_modules/angular-ui-router/release/* lib/angular-ui-router/release
